Down

Title:
WallType
By Dim

Title: View Range Up
LongDescription: Move up view range. To edit the step, go to config.
ToolTipDescription: Move up view range. To edit the step, go to config.

Title: View Range Down
LongDescription: Move down view range. To edit the step, go to config.
ToolTipDescription: Move down view range. To edit the step, go to config.

Title: Open Views
LongDescription: Allows to open multiple views selected from the project browser
ToolTipDescription: Allows to open multiple views selected from the project browser

Isolate
Temp

ToolTipDescription: Isolate point clouds temporary from the active view

Title:
Show
Hide

ToolTipDescription: Show/Hide point clouds from the active view

Title:
Color
Mode
LongDescription: Change the color mode of the point cloud in the active view
ToolTipDescription: Change the color mode of the point cloud in the active view

Hide
